front.title: IEEE Standard for Definite-Purpose Switching Devices for Use in Metal-Enclosed Low-Voltage Power Circuit Breaker Switchgear Amendment 1: Revise Short-Circuit Rating and Test Requirement

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: This amendment to the standard revises the short-circuit rating and test requirements for definite-purpose switching devices for use in metal-enclosed low-voltage power circuit breaker switchgear.
